build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y postgresql-client && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt

deploy.startCommand: python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py migrate && python scripts/post_deploy.py && gunicorn crm.wsgi:application --workers=2 --threads=4 --timeout=120 --max-requests=1000 --max-requests-jitter=50 --log-level=info
